actions.name: Email Received
actions.description: Triggered when a new email is received in your Gmail inbox.

parameters.name: sender_email
parameters.description: The email address of the sender.

parameters.name: received_date
parameters.description: The date and time when the email was received.

actions.name: Email Sent
actions.description: Triggered when an email is sent from your Gmail account.

parameters.name: recipient_email
parameters.description: The email address of the recipient.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The subject of the sent email.

parameters.name: sent_date
parameters.description: The date and time when the email was sent.

reactions.name: Send an Email
reactions.description: Send an email using your Gmail account.

parameters.name: recipient_email
parameters.description: The email address of the recipient.

reactions.name: Reply to an Email
reactions.description: Reply to a specific email in your Gmail inbox.

parameters.name: email_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the email to reply to.

reactions.name: Marked as read/unread
reactions.description: Mark an email as read or unread in your Gmail inbox.

parameters.name: email_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the email to mark.

parameters.name: is_read
parameters.description: Set to true to mark as read, or false to mark as unread.
